ygData.subject: Re: Tribunal Mage Guild
ygData.msgSnippet: I too was wondering what was happening with this guild. I would be interested in starting a mage on the Tribunal server and join even though most of my
ygData.messageBody:
I too was wondering what was happening with this guild.

I would be interested in starting a mage on the Tribunal server and
join even though most of my characters are currently on Saryrn.

Is there a specific race being considered for the guild or are you
taking all comers?

Trej

In theeverquesttavern@y..., "nitecollector" <nitecollector@m...>
wrote:
> I was just wondering on the status of the proposed mage guild
on
> the tribunal server. I started a DE mage and was wondering if i
was
> wasting my time in playing him, as my main and all my alts are
> currently on Rodcet Nife.
>
>
> Hoping for feedback,
> Magicide (Tribunal)
